WHY K TWO?  

  

Our consultants are renowned for their high technical expertise, interpersonal skills, experience, responsiveness, and winning demeanor. You should have strong technical skills, good values, and be a great team player. We're assembling winners!  

  

Sounds interesting?  

  

We hope so! We place significant emphasis on personal qualities and your commitment. If you share our values and want growth, please get in touch!

title: Webbutvecklare med fokus på e-handel, 50-100%
description:
**Vi söker en hands-on Webbutvecklare som gillar design och funktion för marknadsföring till etablerat och växande Uppsalaföretag.**

 *Arbetet är ett vikariat på 50-100% (Flexibelt beroende på belastning och din tillgänglighet) Januari till Augusti 2023.*

**Om rollen**

  

Brinner du för webben, funktionalitet och bra design i kombination med smart onlinemarknadsföring? Då har vår kund en kul och utvecklande roll att erbjuda dig på en digitalbyrå som ligger i framkant. Man är ett gäng digitala entusiaster med högt i tak, som sitter i mysiga lokaler centralt i Uppsala.


De får ständigt in nya spännande uppdrag och söker nu efter en vass Webbutvecklare som förstår vikten av att kombinera teknik, design och användarvänlighet för att locka besökarna på hemsidan att konvertera. Till exempelvis ett köp, en beställning eller till ytterligare kontakt med företaget. Många av uppdragen är inom E-handel så du behöver ha kunskap och erfarenhet i att bygga bra E-handelssajter.  

  

Den här rollen kräver även att du har förmågan att ha koll på flera parallella spår samtidigt och tidvis är det korta deadlines, varför det är viktigt att du är bekväm med detta och är flexibel. Du kommer vara den som ska ha bäst koll på hur lång tid ett webbprojekt kan ta att genomföra, du kommer därför vara en viktig kugge i offertarbetet och stötta projektledarna i tidsplaneringen.


Emellanåt kommer du få ha den direkta kontakten med våra kunder så viktigt att du känner dig trygg i detta och att du har en trevlig och glad framtoning.

 **Viktiga Kompetenser och Egenskaper**


För att riktigt trivas och utvecklas på ett positivt sätt i denna roll är vi övertygade att följande stämmer in på dig...


* Du är van att jobba i Wordpress och att bygga proffsiga sajter från scratch till lansering. Du behöver vara bekväm att kunna jobba med både "drag & drop sidor" och mer kodbaserade sidor.
* Kan hantera och uppdatera befintliga sajter med olika konfigureringar.
* Har kunskap inom WooCommerce och liknande.
* Har en känsla för design och användarvänlighet med fokus på att hemsidan ska konvertera/generera leads på bästa sätt.
* Har grundläggande kunskaper inom JQuery/Javascript och PHP, MySQL och databashantering.
* Har en grundläggande kunskaper/förståelse inom SEO.
* Du är van att hantera olika webbhotell och hosting för hemsidor.
* Kan hantera kundkontakter i ett projekt och vara behjälplig internt med offerter och estimera tid för diverse projekt.
* Har kunskap inom webbdesign/grafisk design.
* Gärna har en känsla för att skriva bra copytexter.
* Hantering av företagets interna system såsom mail (Google Workspace) och server (Dropbox). Detta är en extremt liten del av jobbet, men ändå bra att man kan rycka in om det behövs.

 **Om företaget**


Företaget har en väldigt avslappnad företagskultur med mycket frihet under ansvar. De är ett skönt gäng som trivs bra ihop och där alla mycket intresserade av digital marknadsföring och kommunikation. De sitter i härliga lokaler tillsammans med många andra företag och konsulter. Det gör att det är en kul och inspirerande miljö, dessutom med AW ca en gång i månaden och lite andra upptåg då och då. De är flexibla när det gäller var man sitter, det viktiga är att man kan ta ansvar över sina uppgifter och är disciplinerad samt rapporterar löpande vad man gör så teamet kan funka bra. Behöver man så finns därmed möjligheten att jobba hemifrån ett par dagar i veckan.

 **Vem är du?**


Företaget präglas av en positiv stämning och bra teamarbete. Det är viktigt att alla trivs och tillsammans presterar och mår bra. Därför söker man dig som är en lagspelare och är initiativkraftig, ansvarskännande och tror på prestigelöst teamarbete. Självklart vill du även ha roligt och skratta på jobbet tillsammans med dina kollegor.

 **Låter det intressant?**


Rollen är en 50-100% tjänst, Januari till Augusti 2023. Du kommer vara anställd hos oss på Uppstuk under perioden.  

  

Tjänsten tillsätts löpande, *vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan!*

***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb!***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: Två fullstack webbutvecklare till teamfokuserat bolag
description:
**Vi söker dig som vill jobba med webbutveckling tillsammans med positiva medarbetare i självständiga team, som vinner tillsammans!**


Är du en teknikintresserad och driven webbutvecklare som vill arbeta i ett välmående och växande företag så är detta jobbet för dig!

  

* *Frihet i arbetet med eget ansvar & flexibla arbetstider.*
* *Central & utvecklande roll i uppdragen.*
* *Agil full stack webbutveckling.*
* *Arbete inhouse med bra kollegor och fokus på sammanhållning.*
* *Ett trevligt kontor i centrala Uppsala*
* *Varierande & utvecklande uppdrag*

**Vad du kommer jobba med.**  

Du kommer jobba med kundanpassad systemutveckling, där webben dominerar. Du kommer arbeta både i team och på egen hand. Kamratskap och sammanhållningen är A och O tillsammans med dina kollegor som är teknikhungriga teamspelare.


Kunder varierar från stora multinationella företag till rikstäckande och lokala företag.

**Vad erbjuder de dig?**


Arbete inhouse på företagets fräscha kontor (när inte Corona sätter stopp för det) centralt i Uppsala, 20-talet trevliga kollegor samt mycket frihet under ansvar.  

Varierande, utvecklande och spännande uppdrag med agilt arbete där man jobbar nära kunden. Din förmåga att kommunicera med kollegor och kunder är därför en mycket viktig del.

**Vem är du?**


För att trivas, prestera och utvecklas i jobbet bör detta passa in på dig:  

Du är positiv, social och har god initiativförmåga. Att du är noggrann och strukturerad liksom att du har stort intresse för problemlösning är också grundläggande egenskaper.  

Även en mer junior utvecklare med stor framåtanda, samarbetsförmåga och kunskapstörst skulle passa in och utvecklas i gruppen.

**Det är viktigt för rollen att du har god kunskap om och erfarenhet av**

* C#, Javascript, Angular, CSS, HTML, CSS, SQL (databaser), Entity Framework
* Skräddarsydda webbsystem, webbsidor, e-handel, Apier och även app-utveckling om man önskar hålla på med det.

**Är detta du**


Skicka in din ansökan så tar vi ett samtal som första steg.  

Detta är rekrytering för anställning i företaget. Omfattningen är 100% (Kan eventuellt anpassas).  

Vi rekryterar så snart vi hittar rätt person, *vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan*" eller liknande.

***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb! Det är då medarbetare och företag får bästa resultat.***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: Drivna utvecklare till växande, prisbelönt IT-bolag i...
description:
*Vi söker tillsammans med ett starkt växande och prisbelönat IT-företag i Uppsala, just dig som är en driven och duktig mjukvaruutvecklare med bra teamkänsla.*

 **Om företagets framtid:** ”Efter några tuffa år för branschen ser vi nu en stor optimism och framför allt en ökad satsning på moderna it-baserade tjänster. Ett område som utvecklas väldigt mycket just nu, och där vi ligger i framkant, är t.ex. app- och webbaserade beställningstjänster med kopplingar till nya online- och apptjänster etc men också nya sätt att jobba med bokning och betalningar t.ex. med koppling till de stora söktjänsterna som Google. Flera av våra stora kunder börjar också expandera utomlands vilket gör att vi kommer att lansera våra produkter mer även internationellt framöver från att ha haft den absoluta merparten av våra kunder i Sverige. Vi ser därför en spännande expansion framför oss.”

**Vilka kompetenser söker man nu i sina team?**


Man söker flera utvecklare inom olika områden. Fokus är:


* Apputvecklare (Android/Kotlin och/eller iOS/Swift)
* Java-backendutvecklare
* .NET-backend / fullstack

**Hur kommer du arbeta?**  

Du kommer jobba i agila självorganiserande team på mellan 4-10 personer inklusive designers, testare och produktägare. Teamen får lämnar stor frihet till att hitta sina egna arbetssätt där vilja och förmåga till samarbete är mycket viktigt. Vi har en bra blandning av seniora och juniora personer där alla tar ansvar och är med i arbetet att driva våra produkter framåt och delar med sig av sin kunksap. ”Vi lägger stor vikt vid att ha ett trevligt och fräscht kontor som främjar samarbete. Även om branschen kommer att förändras efter pandemin med ökat distansarbete (vilket vi naturligtvis också tillåter) vill vi att vårt kontor ska vara så trevligt att det är ett ställe man vill komma in till, eftersom vi tror att man får bäst samarbete och teamkänsla när man träffas på plats. Det ska också vara ett ställe där man kan koppla av mellan varven varför vi har bl.a. pingisbord, biljardbord och ett musikrum.”


**För att prestera och trivas i rollen behöver du..****:**


Ha en god kompetens och några års erfarenhet inom dessa områden:  

* Apputvecklare (Android/Kotlin och/eller iOS/Swift)
* Java-backend.
* .NET-backend / fullstack
**Det är ett stort plus ifall du:**


- Har ett brett IT-intresse när det kommer till utveckling, även utanför ditt fokusområde. - Är en utpräglad teammedlem, och gillar att vinna tillsammans. - Trivs i att jobba i en växande och föränderlig organisation.


**Låter det intressant?**


Vi anställer när vi hittat rätt person, som känner att detta är rätt jobb och arbetsplats, så sök redan idag. Anställningarna är på 100% tills vidare. Ansök redan idag så tar vi kontakt med dig för ett samtal.


***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig, tillsammans med våra kunder, som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb!***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: Utvecklare av App med kostrådgivning och hälsa
description:
*Vill du vara med och utveckla med en tjänst som främjar hälsa och välmående är detta något för dig!*

 **Arbetsuppgifter:**


Uppdraget är att uppdatera och utveckla en existerande app och även back-end för en tjänst som funnits och använts i ett flertal år. Beroende på kompetenser som krävs kommer vi kanske behöva vara mer än en utvecklare.


Fokus för detta uppdrag är till en början vara:  

* Uppdatera och anpassa appar till dagens krav från Apple respektive android miljö.
* Fixa kända och eventuella buggar som dyker upp under arbetets gång.
* Uppdatera hur kundbeställningar hanteras utifrån olika betalningsalternativ.


-Uppdatera design på appar och webben - eventuellt med hjälp av designer.  

-Fräscha upp hemsida - eventuellt med hjälp av designer.  

* Förbättra befintliga funktioner i programmet.
* Börja bygga på ny funktionalitet.
**Vem är du?**


Du är en kreativ utvecklare som är en ansvarstagande och problemlösande person, van att arbeta självständigt och i små nära team.

**Det är viktigt för rollen att du**


Följande språk och miljöer används i denna produkt:  

* Apple (kod ligger i Bitbucket)
* XCode eller Objective-C (för äldre del av kod)
* Swift i senare uppdateringar.
* Google/Android (kod ligger i Bitbucket)
* Java
* Web (kod ligger i GitHub)


-.NET MVC - ramverk  

-C# - huvudspråk  

-JavaScript - en del front-end där realtidsuppdateringar krävs
Databas  

* MS SQL
 **Arbetstider och omfattning**


Arbetstider kan vara flexibla beroende på både uppdragets behov och dina möjligheter.
  

Omfattningen kommer vara totalt 30-50% över tid. Vi kan vid behov sprida ut detta på ett par konsulter. Det passar därför om du även studerar eller har annan sysselsättning parallellt.  

Uppdraget är tills vidare, men kan variera i omfattning över tid.

**Låter det intressant?**


Då är du välkommen att kontakta oss och ansöka på en gång.


Vi tillsätter tjänsten så snart vi hittar rätt person, *vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan utan skicka in idag.*

***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb!***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: C# utvecklare till spännande företag i Uppsala
description:
**Tycker du om idén att genom ditt arbete bidra till att rädda människors liv? Har du ett stort intresse för systemutveckling och mjukvaruutveckling? Då vill vi ta ett möte med dig!**

*Företaget är en innovativ pionjär inom bioteknik som hjälper till att rädda liv genom att se till att antibiotika fortsätter att vara en effektiv behandling för kommande generationer. De utvecklar och levererar lösningar för vårdgivare så att de kan diagnostisera och behandla infektionssjukdomar på kortast möjligast tid. Deras lösningar hjälper vårdgivare över hela världen att minska användningen av antibiotika genom att ge optimal behandlingsinformation för varje patient. De befinner sig nu i en tillväxtfas och söker därför duktiga utvecklare att utöka sitt team med. Företaget består idag av ett interdisciplinärt och mycket motiverat team som bedriver sin verksamhet i moderna och väl anpassade lokaler i Uppsala Science Park. I rådande läge sker arbete helt eller delvis hemifrån.*

 **Det viktigt att du:**

* Har minst ett par års erfarenhet där du har utvecklat programvara i C #
* Har erfarenhet i att arbeta med GUI i WPF
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på både svenska och engelska
* Brinner för problemlösning och förbättring i ditt arbete
* Har lätt för att samarbeta effektivt med andra för att nå uppsatta mål

**I det andra företaget är det meriterande att du:**

* Har examen inom någon form av IT på högskolenivå
* Har erfarenhet i att arbeta med skriptning i PowerShell för testning av system.

 **Låter det intressant?**


Tjänsten är ett konsultuppdrag på heltid under en period om 4-5 månader med god möjlighet till förlängning och överrekrytering hos företaget. Vi välkomnar ansökningar även från dig som vill arbeta som underkonsult. Tjänster kan tillsättas omgående, tveka därför inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb!***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: .NET / C# -utvecklare till två spännande företag i Uppsala
description:
**Gillar du idén att arbeta i ett globalt företag eller tycker du om idén att genom ditt arbete bidra till att rädda människors liv? Har du ett stort intresse för systemutveckling och mjukvaruutveckling? Då vill vi ta ett möte med dig!**

*Det första företaget i fråga är en internationell organisation som möjliggör effektivisering och rationalisering av Supply chain-processen mellan köpande och säljande företag inom detaljhandeln. Detta genom en gigantisk databas som fungerar som ett naturligt nav och ett gemensamt gränssnitt för utbyte av data, information och media. Du kommer här att arbeta i ett team som kännetecknas av öppenhet, driv, prestigelöshet, pragmatism, ödmjukhet och hög kodkvalitet. Företaget utvecklar i enlighet med krav, specifikationer och god arkitektur - med ett ständigt fokus på att ge affärsvärde för företagets kunder och med stolthet över att transformera en hel bransch. Din arbetsplats kommer att vara på ett eleganta kontor med Uppsalas bästa pendlarläge, alldeles intill Uppsala centralstation. I rådande läge sker arbete helt eller delvis hemifrån.*  

  

*Det andra företaget i fråga är en innovativ pionjär inom bioteknik som hjälper till att rädda liv genom att se till att antibiotika fortsätter att vara en effektiv behandling för kommande generationer. De utvecklar och levererar lösningar för vårdgivare så att de kan diagnostisera och behandla infektionssjukdomar på kortast möjligast tid. Deras lösningar hjälper vårdgivare över hela världen att minska användningen av antibiotika genom att ge optimal behandlingsinformation för varje patient. De befinner sig nu i en tillväxtfas och söker därför duktiga utvecklare att utöka sitt team med. Företaget består idag av ett interdisciplinärt och mycket motiverat team som bedriver sin verksamhet i moderna och väl anpassade lokaler i Uppsala Science Park. I rådande läge sker arbete helt eller delvis hemifrån.*

 **I det första företaget är det viktigt att du:**

* Har minst två års erfarenhet från en liknande position där du har utvecklat programvara i C # .NET
* Har erfarenhet av några av de tekniker som används: ASP.NET, Entity Framework, AngularJS
* Är flytande på engelska i skrift och tal
* Har erfarenhet av programmering av Windows-applikationer, tjänster och webbtjänster.
* Är en driven och lösningsorienterad person med ett strukturerat och systematiskt mindset med analytiska färdigheter

**I det första företaget är det meriterande att du:**

* Har en relevant utbildning i mjukvaruutveckling
* Har erfarenhet av Azure (eller AWS) och Git
* Har arbetat med testdriven utveckling

Har arbetat inom detaljhandeln, hanterat digitala beställningar och fakturor samt har kunskap om olika sätt för IT-system att kommunicera med varandra.  
* 

**I det andra företaget är det viktigt att du:**

* Har minst ett par års erfarenhet där du har utvecklat programvara i C # .NET
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på både svenska och engelska
* Brinner för problemlösning och förbättring i ditt arbete
* Har lätt för att samarbeta effektivt med andra för att nå uppsatta mål

**I det andra företaget är det meriterande att du:**

* Har examen inom någon form av IT på högskolenivå

 **Låter det intressant?**


Tjänsterna är konsultuppdrag på heltid under en period om 4-5 månader med god möjlighet till förlängning och överrekrytering hos båda företagen. Underkonsulter kan även vara aktuellt för ett par av dessa tjänster och vi välkomnar således ansökningar från dig som vill arbeta som underkonsult. Tjänsterna ska tillsättas omgående med förväntat uppstart efter årsskiftet eller enligt överenskommelse. Tveka därför inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

***På Uppstuk sätter vi dig som medarbetare först, skapar oss en förståelse för vad som driver dig och matchar dig med ditt drömjobb!***


I och med GDPR tar vi tyvärr inte emot ansökningar per mail.

title: Junior Backend Developer
description:
At Intric, we’re building the future of AI in Europe — a platform where intelligent agents can be developed and deployed with full control, transparency and trust. Our focus is on serving the public sector and organizations that care deeply about data sovereignty. Now, we’re looking for a curious and driven Junior Developer who wants to be part of something ambitious from the start.
   

  

**The Role**
 In this role, you’ll work at the heart of our engineering team, contributing to a growing AI platform with real-world impact. Your main focus will be to design and build integrations that enhance how our platform connects with data, systems and users. You’ll work alongside experienced developers, but also have plenty of room to think independently, suggest improvements, and push ideas forward.
   

  

 This is a rare opportunity to grow quickly in a high-performing team and explore the intersection between modern backend development and applied AI. We see programming as a craft — something to approach with care, creativity and deep engagement — and we’re looking for someone who shares that mindset.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re smart, focused, and you enjoy turning ideas into working code. You know how to break down problems and find practical solutions, and you’re not afraid of technical challenges — in fact, you’re energized by them. You bring a thoughtful perspective to your work and take ownership of your contributions, but you also enjoy collaborating and learning from others.
   

  

 You’re still early in your career, but you’ve already shown initiative — through projects, studies or work experience — and you’re ready to take the next step in an environment where your work will matter.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* A BSc or MSc in Computer Science or a related field
* 1–2 years of hands-on experience in software development
* A strong interest in AI and its practical applications
* Demonstrated ability to complete technical projects, either in school or at work
* Examples of overcoming challenges through smart, structured solutions
* A mindset that goes beyond the brief — you spot opportunities and act on them


**Our tech-stack**
**App**
 Python, FastAPI
   

  

**Infrastructure**
 Docker, PostgreSQL, Redis, pgvector, Arq, vLLM
   

  

**Other Important Tools / Techniques**
 Linux, Bash, Domain Driven Design
   

  

**Why joins us?**
* Be a part of a visionary team establishing the future of AI in Europe.
* Contribute to a transformative product with applications that have a meaningful impact in society.
* Grow quickly in a hands-on, learning-focused environment
* Contribute to an ambitious product with room for ownership
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
At Intric, we are on a mission to revolutionize the AI landscape in Europe and beyond. Our state-of-the-art AI platform is designed to seamlessly integrate intelligent agents with an emphasis on the public sector and companies with a keen interest in data sovereignty.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are seeking a talented Fullstack Developer to manage and adapt our open-source platform, ensuring it meets customer needs seamlessly. In this role, you will interact with clients, gather their requirements, and deliver customized solutions, maintaining the platform's excellence and functionality.
   

  

****Key Responsibilities****
* Manage and customize our open-source platform to align with specific client needs.
* Participate in customer meetings to gather requirements and provide valuable insights.
* Develop and implement customer-specific configurations and improvements.
* Provide expert troubleshooting and resolve technical challenges efficiently.
* Ensure delivery of high-quality solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations.


**Ideal Candidate Profile**
**Core qualities**
* Intelligent and execution-focused, with a knack for delivering results.
* Able to independently devise strategic solutions based on client requirements.
* Thrive in solving complex technical problems.


**Cultural attributes**
* Committed to our long-term vision and willing to grow with the organization.
* Passionate about building extraordinary solutions from the ground up.
* Collaborative team player who excels in competitive environments.


**Experience & Skills Required**
* Extensive experience in fullstack development.
* Proven ability to manage software enhancements based on client feedback.
* Track record of delivering comprehensive features or end-to-end solutions.


**Our tech-stack**
**Backend App**
 Python, FastAPI
   

  

**Frontend Webapp**
 Node, Typescript, HTML/CSS, Svelte/Kit, Tailwind, Melt UI
   

  

**Infrastructure**
 Docker, PostgreSQL, Redis, pgvector, Arq, vLLM
   

  

**Other Important Tools / Techniques**
 Linux, Bash, Domain Driven Design
   

  

**Why joins us?**
* Be a part of a visionary team establishing the future of AI in Europe.
* Work in a stimulating environment with opportunities for professional growth.
* Rapid career development in an exciting, fast-moving sector
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
At Intric, we're on a mission to let everyone benefit from generative AI by making the creation and deployment of AI-based tools easy, open, and secure. Our collaborative web application is already a trusted resource within the Swedish public sector and we’ll now be entering a pivotal growth phase. Join us now and be a core part of our ambitious journey.
   

  

**The Role**
 As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you’ll lead the development of a fast, accessible and scalable web experience. Your work will range from building new features to refining our architecture, always with the end-user in focus. You'll collaborate closely with developers, product designers and business teams to continuously improve the platform across both desktop and mobile.
   

  

 Our tech stack consists of Node, TypeScript, HTML/CSS, Svelte/SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, Melt UI. Infrastructure: Docker, Git, Jira
   

  

**The** 
**Team**
 You’ll be joining a cross-functional, fast-moving product team with a collaborative mindset. We keep processes lightweight and adapt as we go. You’ll have significant freedom to influence both technology and direction — and we value sharing, learning and pragmatic decisions above hierarchy or rigid frameworks.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 You have 3–5+ years of frontend engineering experience with a solid understanding of core web technologies (HTML/DOM, HTTP, JavaScript/TypeScript). Your experienced in building and scaling modern web applications and proficient in state management and caching (preferably in Svelte or similar frameworks).
   

  

 You can write efficient, maintainable, and accessible code with a collaborative mindset and strong communication skills.
   

  

 You might have a degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
   

  

 While not a must, experience with Svelte/SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS and familiarity with developer tooling and internal workflows is a plus.
   

  

**Perks**
* Flexible, trust-based work environment
* High degree of ownership and influence
* Work on meaningful technology with real societal impact
* A collaborative and curious team that values continuous learning


 For this recruitment, we are using our recruitment partner Detechtiv. Please contact Oliver Aulin at oliver.aulin@detechtiv.se for more information.

title: Software Engineer - Backend
description:
**Do you want to join the technological revolution? Tendium is looking for a
 *Software Engineer* 
 to join the team.** 




  





*At Tendium, we build cutting-edge AI solutions that help customers make sense of complex and fragmented procurement data. As part of our AI/ML Ops team, you will be responsible for the deployment, observability, and performance of our machine learning solutions. Your work will ensure that our data processing runs reliably at scale, enabling our customers to seamlessly interact with and extract value from critical information. You will also take ownership of integrating and optimizing robust, scalable databases that support our core data workflows, from document metadata and vector embeddings to structured procurement insights.* 




  





**Why Tendium** 




 Tendium is a fast-growing tech company operating at the intersection of technology and customers. Using advanced machine-learning technologies, we are revolutionising industries with modern, efficient methods — creating new possibilities to democratise both public and private sector markets.
 



  





 Our team is expanding rapidly, bringing together some of the brightest talents from across Sweden and beyond, from data scientists to sales professionals. While we recognise the need for structure as we grow, we strive to maintain a collaborative environment where responsibility, autonomy, and individual input are highly valued.
 



  





 As Tendium grows, new opportunities emerge constantly. We’re looking for ambitious, conscientious, and value-driven colleagues to help shape the future of the business. In return, we offer a dynamic, intellectually stimulating environment where personal and professional development is prioritised. You'll have real responsibility and growth opportunities from the start.
 



  





 If you’re ready to make an impact and grow with us — we want to hear from you.
 



  





**The Job** 




 The work environment will be agile, and you’ll work alongside self-sustaining teams. Your team will have full ownership over the products and features you create, leveraging continuous delivery practices. We strive towards having development teams at Tendium that are self-reliant, comprising a spectrum of skills encompassing backend, frontend, infrastructure, and dev-ops expertise.
 



  





 As a team, we always strive to use state-of-the-art technology and stay at the forefront of development. Working agile means that we build minimum viable products, but we always aim for high-quality code. Moreover, we encourage everyone to share their thoughts and ideas, regardless of their area of expertise. We believe that great input can come from anywhere, and that includes how we work, not just what we work on. You’ll have the opportunity to shape both our product and our ways of working. And if you want to dig deep in a technical area you will always find someone interested in the team.
 



  





*We are looking for primarily* 
***Stockholm based candidates***
*and we work in a* 
***hybrid environment***
*.* 




  





**Our Current Stack** 



* Backend: NodeJS (TypeScript), GraphQL (microservice architecture),
* DBs: PostgreSQL, OpenSearch, DocumentDB (MongoDB), S3
* Infrastructure: AWS containerized and serverless compute through TypeScript CDK
* Languages: Typescript (backend and infrastructure)



  





**Who we are looking for** 




 For this position, we seek an individual who can demonstrate responsibility and initiative, as well as great attention to detail. You should value structure and possess a good ability to write scalable code at both macro and micro levels. You need to be comfortable with data modelling and have an understanding of how data decisions made upstream in a data pipeline affect end results.
 



  





 At Tendium, the tech teams work with continuous delivery and we aim for fast delivery with quality code, without over-engineering. We value constructive problem solving and are looking for someone who enjoys taking on new tasks and features and appreciates learning about and using new technology and solutions. Furthermore, we are on the lookout for individuals who find fulfillment in collaborative problem-solving and appreciate collaborating closely with team and colleagues (e.g. pair programming), and that is why we are looking for those qualities in you.
 



 Ideal candidates should have a few years of experience in backend development with a focus on data engineering.
 



  





 Note that by experience, we do not necessarily mean employment. We care about what you can do, not how long you’ve been on the payroll. We are open to ambitious candidates who have recently graduated, as long as they can demonstrate extraordinary understanding of what the role entails and how they can contribute.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* MSc Degree in computer science or similar
* 2+ years experience working with backend development.
* Proficient in SQL databases, with hands-on experience in database setup and integration.
* Experience working with Cloud storage or computing
* Based in Stockholm or surrounding areas
* Fluent in English



  





**Meritorious** 



* Proficient in TypeScript
* Experience working with large scale ML deployments.
* AWS Experience
* Wide experience in working with different AWS Storage solutions.



  





*For this role, we offer a permanent employment (Sw: tillsvidareanställning) starting with a 6-month probationary period.* 




  





**What We Offer You** 




 As part of our commitment to your overall well-being and professional growth, we are pleased to highlight some of the "soft" and social benefits you will enjoy as a member of our team:
 



  





**Exciting and Supportive Company Culture:** 
 We take pride in cultivating a vibrant and inclusive company culture that encourages collaboration, creativity, and innovation.
 



  





**Central Stockholm Location:** 
 Our office is strategically located in the heart of Stockholm.
 



  





**Breakfast at the office** 
 : All employees at the office have access to free breakfast every day.
 



  





**After Works, Parties, and Fun Activities:** 
 We are proud to promote a lively and engaging atmosphere, where we not only work hard but also take the time to celebrate our successes and cultivate strong connections among our team.
 



  





**Occupational Pension:** 
 Once you have passed your probation period, you will be enrolled in the pension scheme.
 



  





**Application** 




 We look forward to your application. We are looking to hire someone with a start date of
 **September 1st, or as close to this as possible** 
 . Successful candidates will initially be invited to a first interview where you will have the opportunity to meet the team.
 



  





 To make this process even more efficient, feel free to sign in to your Connect profile and add your references at any stage.
 



  





 Please find additional information on our recruitment process
 *here.* 




  





 If you want to know more about our culture and what you can expect when working at Tendium you can read more about it
 *here.* 




  





**Equality and inclusion statement** 




 At Tendium, we don’t just value diversity — we celebrate it. We’re building a workplace where everyone should feel that they belong, where your voice is heard, and your experiences are respected. Different perspectives fuel our creativity and drive innovation, and we’re always looking for people who can bring something new to the team. Whoever you are, wherever you're from — we’d love to hear from you. Let’s shape the future together.
 



 At Tendium we’re using data to transform public procurement, giving our clients better access to public tenders and helping governments to curb waste and enhance transparency.
 



  





 For more information contact career@tendium.com

title: Java Software Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
Vill du utvecklas i en miljö där innovation, gemenskap och samhällsnytta står i fokus? Hos Sopra Steria får du arbeta med digitala lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad – tillsammans med drivna kollegor i ett företag som prisats som
 *Sveriges bästa arbetsplats* 
 av Great Place to Work. Vi söker nu fler Javautvecklare till våra agila team i Stockholm!
 



  





 Som Javautvecklare hos oss blir du en del av våra agila teamleveranser, där du arbetar nära både kollegor och kunder för att utveckla lösningar som bidrar till samhällsnytta och teknisk innovation. Våra projekt är ofta långsiktiga och inkluderar tekniklyft hos kunder inom exempelvis offentlig sektor. I rollen får du jobba med modern teknik som Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes och ramverk som Angular, React eller Vue. Vi har en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning och gemenskap, där du blir en viktig del av vårt utvecklarcommunity. Läs mer här!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling.
* Är nyfiken på nya tekniker och värdesätter kunskapsdelning.
* Trivs med att samarbeta nära kunder och kollegor.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.



  





**Varför Sopra Steria?** 



* En arbetsplats som förenar trygghet och flexibilitet.
* Prisbelönt företagskultur med fokus på gemenskap och personlig utveckling.
* Spännande projekt som gör skillnad i samhället.
* Ett starkt team där du utvecklas tillsammans med kompetenta och hjälpsamma kollegor.



  





**Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!** 




 Vi behandlar ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation. Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer, ett logiskt test, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Denna kombination av urvalsmetoder ger oss en bredare och mer rättvis bild av dig som kandidat, samtidigt som det säkerställer att både dina tekniska och personliga styrkor kommer till sin rätt. För dig som kandidat innebär det en möjlighet att visa din kompetens och potential från flera perspektiv. Har du frågor om rollen? Kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryterare, Hanna Korell, på
 **hanna.korell@soprasteria.com** 
 .

title: Game Developer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a consultant in Game Development at Coody, you’ll have the opportunity to work with some of the most inspiring digital entertainment companies in the world, in fields such as Games, AR/VR, Music, and other forms of interactive media. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, artists, producers, and product managers.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to hit the ground running in new environments. We see every challenge as an opportunity to grow. Typically, you’ll work on 1-2 assignments per year for companies in industries that you’re passionate about.
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re after talented game developers who love to build immersive experiences and bring ideas to life. You thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy pushing technical boundaries, and want the freedom to work on exciting projects - without the corporate nonsense.
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in software development.
* Hands-on experience with building games, VR/AR, or similar interactive experiences.
* Solid skills in modern C++, Lua, AngelScript, or web technologies.
* Experience from Unreal Engine (a bonus).
* A relevant degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Game Development, or similar.
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency.
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
Come join our journey at BONI — a creative tech startup on a mission to revolutionize interior design. We’re building an AI-powered platform that helps designers turn ideas into stunning visuals in minutes - mood boards, to-scale floor plans, product discovery and shopping, all in one smart tool. Think of it as a creative canvas with a smart catalog: designers can drag & drop furniture and materials, and our system assists with AI-powered product suggestions and image editing.
 



  





 We’re a small, fast-moving team and we’re now looking for a
 **Fullstack Engineer** 
 to help take our product to the next level. You'll work across the full tech stack, build features end-to-end, shape our AI features and play a key role in the product’s future. Together with our CTO, you will form our core Engineering team.
 



  





 You should be comfortable moving fast and solving complex technical problems wherever they arise. This is a hands-on role with a ton of ownership – and a future path to Tech Lead. Join a team where creativity and AI go hand in hand — it’s a super exciting space to be in, and you’ll be right in the middle of it, helping shape what’s next!
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 




  




* **Full-Stack Development:** 
 From sleek UI in React to smart APIs and data models — you'll build and ship features across the stack and shape how designers interact with our product.
* **AI Integration:** 
 Finding clever ways to bring AI into the product experience and integrating AI/ML models to build a better, more magical product — from smart recommendations to image editing, image generations and visual search. You'll work with models in Python and deploy them into our Node.js/AWS stack.
* **Architecture & DevOps:** 
 Take part in high-level architecture decisions and use tools like GitHub Actions to ensure smooth deployment.
* **Tech Leadership:** 
 Be a driver of best practices in code review, testing, and teamwork. Mentor future hires and lead by example as we grow.
* **Always Innovating:** 
  Whether it’s a new React library for 3D graphics or a breakthrough in generative AI APIs, you keep an eye on trends, bring fresh ideas and experiment where it can benefit the product.



  





**Who you are:** 




  




* You’re a
 **highly skilled developer** 
 with 4+ years of fullstack engineering experience in fast-paced environments. Start-up experience is a plus.
 
 (We’re flexible if you don’t exactly fit the “years” as long as you have the skillset)
* **Front-end skills** 
 : Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript and React, with experience building complex UIs and a sharp eye for UX. Familiarity with state management, component design, and performance tuning in the browser. Bonus if you’ve worked with canvas/graphics libraries like FabricJS or Three.js as well as Figma.
* **Back-end skills:** 
 Comfortable with Node.js (or open to using it). Experience with RESTful APIs and databases — we use MongoDB, but SQL/ORM knowledge works too.
* **Strong interest in creative applications of AI** 
 : You’re excited by the possibilities of AI and love using it as a creative tool in your development process. Experience with integrating GenAI APIs and/or working with AI/ML models.
* **Architecture & DevOps:** 
 Experience with deploying to cloud platforms (AWS/Azure), CI/CD, and shaping tech architecture
* **Education:** 
 A degree in Computer Science or related field is great to have, but proven experience and a great portfolio or GitHub will speak louder.
* A team player with positive attitude and without prestige.
 **Self-going and proactive** 
 who contribute ideas and initiatives. You’re curious with
 **strong problem-solving skills** 
 and always exploring what’s possible.
* Fluent in English and preferable Swedish
* Based in or open to relocating to Stockholm (hybrid role)



  





**Why BONI?** 




  




* **Real impact:** 
 The opportunity to join an early-stage startup and literally build a product from the ground up. Be part of shaping the future of how designers work
* **Flexible setup** 
 : Flexible hybrid setup, with collaboration days in our office in the heart of Stockholm
* **Creative culture** 
 : No bureaucracy, just meaningful work with a collaborative, creative and fun-loving team
* **Grow with us** 
 : Take on responsibility, grow into leadership, and define our tech and culture. You’re not just building the product, you’re helping build the company.



  





 If you're excited by innovation, AI, and building tools that empower designers — come help shape BONI’s future!

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
At Intric, we are on a mission to revolutionize the AI landscape in Europe and beyond. Our state-of-the-art AI platform is designed to seamlessly integrate intelligent agents with an emphasis on the public sector and companies with a keen interest in data sovereignty.
   

  

 Our collaborative web application is already a trusted resource within the Swedish public sector and we are now in a pivotal growth phase. Join us now and be a core part of our ambitious journey.
   

  

 We are looking for a passionate Senior Backend Developer to join our dynamic team. This is an exceptional opportunity to grow your skills in a cutting-edge environment and contribute to a meaningful product that push the boundaries of AI technology.
   

  

**As a Senior Backend Developer, you will:**
* Be key in enhancing our application by developing and integrating robust features that meet the evolving needs of our growing user base.
* Collaborate closely with engineers and business developers, contributing to a diverse array of new and existing features that define the experience of our platform across desktop and mobile use-cases.
* Drive the continuous improvement of our application's architecture, maintaining high standards of performance and accessibility.
* Implement and refine tools to enhance the developer experience, empowering the whole team in their work.


****Who you are:****
* A driven software engineer with 3-5+ years of experience and ready to meet new challenges head-on with a robust and evolving tech stack.
* A proactive problem-solver, you’re passionate about both innovation and pragmatic solutions.
* You’re curious and open-minded, continuously learning and eager to understand everything you’re working on
* You thrive in teamwork and value collaboration, always ready to share insights and foster a learning environment.
* You have successfully shipped and scaled web applications to accommodate rapid user growth.


**Key Qualifications**
* Solid understanding of modern web technologies and standards from the ground up, including HTTP, RESTful APIs, and web server frameworks.
* Proven experience in building and maintaining scalable web-based applications.
* Proficiency in database management and optimization.
* Experience in configuring and managing infrastructure for deploying web applications at scale.
* Competency in writing, maintaining, and deploying efficient and performant code.
* Either a degree in Computer Science or related fields, or equivalent industry experience.


**Our tech-stack**
**Backend App**
 Python, FastAPI
   

  

**Infrastructure**
 Docker, PostgreSQL, Redis, pgvector, Arq, vLLM
   

  

**Other Important Tools / Techniques**
 Linux, Bash, Domain Driven Design
   

  

**Why joins us?**
* Be a part of a visionary team establishing the future of AI in Europe.
* Work on a product with real societal impact.
* Work in a stimulating environment with opportunities for professional growth.
* Rapid career development in an exciting, fast-moving sector.
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options.

title: Software Engineer - Open banking
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 At Tink, we deliver open banking solutions as a part of Visa. We’re creating the foundations that a new world of finance will be built on. By constantly challenging ourselves to go further and do better, we’re developing the ground-breaking services that businesses will use, to revolutionize the way millions of people manage their money. The world of financial services is changing fast, and we will continue to be at the forefront of it.
   

  

  

  

 Tink is building an open banking platform that enables banks, fintechs and startups to develop data-driven financial services. Through one API, Tink allows customers to access aggregated financial data, initiate payments, enrich transactions and build personal finance management tools. Tink connects to more than 3,400 banks that reach over 250 million bank customers across Europe. Our solutions are ready-to-go products, each developed to solve specific problems and bring value to both businesses and their customers.
   

  





**What we offer you:** 
  

  





 You will be working in an international environment where your responsibilities will include:
   

  




* Work with Tink’s technologies which is mainly Java, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Datadog, REST and much more.


* Develop reliable, scalable, high performance and highly distributed systems that power open banking products for different markets using your technical expertise.


* Innovate around new features and measure how these features perform, being instrumental in bringing the product vision to life.


* Collaborate and build high-quality products by following best engineering practices.



 We strongly believe in the power of collaboration, both within our team and in partnership with other teams and stakeholders. Working together is the cornerstone of building exceptional teams, delivering outstanding products, and fostering personal growth. It forms the very essence of our work culture and defines how we operate.
   

  

  

  





 This is a hybrid position, and we would like you to be in office three days per week.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 We are currently seeking a talented individual to join the Engineering organization, working from our office in central Stockholm. We see that you enjoy working with others and that you have a passion for what you do. You want to better the product you are working on as well as your knowledge and skills.
   

  





 We would like you to have:
   

  




* Proven experience working as backend engineer with Java technologies


* Experience with a fast-paced environment that is product centric


* Experience from working with DevOps methodologies and tools


* Experience working with agile methodologies and understand the value of tracking engineering key metrics


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: C++ Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Develop the systems that drive Ore UI, using C++
* Collaborate with C++ developers and TypeScript/React developers on building new UI and making API decisions.
* Work with designers and producers to solve user needs.
* Maintain integration between our game and top-of-the-line 3rd party UI technology.
* Collaborate with other teams to drive UI cohesion throughout the game.
* Improve ways of working and technical best practices within the team.
* Coach members within and outside of the team on best practices in software development.
* Balance performance, user experience, and developer experience in every decision.
* Ensure high levels of quality, for example by utilizing good API design and test automation.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Proficiency with C++ (C++17 and C++20).
* Experience working with legacy code.
* Understanding of and interest in rendering and how graphics implementations are made.
* Strong communication and problem-solving skills, as well as a natural collaborator and team player.
* Passion for supporting and understanding how the product teams using Ore UI can work efficiently with the framework.


**Application deadline:** 
 20-06-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Full-stack Developer - Transactional Communications
description:
You could call it a
 **Full-stack Developer** 
 but we’re looking for an enabler of important customer communications.
   

  

 The
 **CRM and Marketing Solutions** 
 unit at
 **If P&C Insurance** 
 is advancing its capabilities in data driven communications and supporting a digital first strategy. To create customer-centric solutions in this area we build a Transactional Communication platform in Azure using an event-driven solution with high business impact.
   

  

**About The Job**
 As
 **Full-stack Developer,** 
 you will build Azure applications and develop our high impact Transactional communication solution used across our whole company for personalized messages in various channels. You’ll join an easy-going Nordic team of developers who make this happen and have fun while doing it.
   

  

 You'll have a high degree of freedom in developing smart functionality in a cloud-first application using several Azure technologies in a loosely coupled architecture. You will have both front-end and back-end development tasks using mainly
 **.Net, C# and React** 
 . We practice agile and DevOps in our day-to-day life.
   

  

 We pride ourselves in improving our Azure solutions with sound engineering principles and Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD, high test coverage and proactive monitoring. We love Tech!
   

  

**About The Team**
 We’re a diverse, Nordic team of highly motivated developers who are passionate about serving customers with timely, personalized communications to help them live a worry-free life and insure what is most dear to them. We work closely with business stakeholders to make this happen.
   

  

 We promote continuous tech nurturing, certifications and learning including hackathons both within our team and together with our partners at
 **Microsoft** 
 and
 **Google** 
 . We love experimentation and constantly follow new technology to create better solutions.
   

  

**We offer**
 Just as we have expectations of you, you should have high expectations of us as your employer. Here are some of the benefits we offer at If:
   

  

* An inclusive workplace where diversity is welcomed and respected.
* Career development opportunities within the largest insurance company in the Nordics.
* Engaging social activities in a professional and highly skilled environment.
* Flexibility through a hybrid working model.
* A health-promoting workplace, including wellness allowances and various sports activities
* Attractive insurance benefits and pension


**Who are you?**
 You’re passionate about solution development in
 **Azure** 
 and have a solid understanding of
 **Object Oriented Programming** 
 using
 **.Net** 
 and
 **C#** 
 .
   

  

 You have previous experience from complex
 **message and event driven architecture** 
 and good understanding of
 **clean coding** 
**& SOLID principles in C#** 
 to be able to solve problems with as simple code as possible.
   

  

 You love developing and using
 **APIs** 
 and
 **microservices** 
 and have experience with
 **SQL/NoSQL** 
 and data storage solutions (e.g
 **SQL Server** 
 and
 **Azure Storage** 
 ). You are serious about Information security and protecting our customers’ integrity.
   

  

 You have hands-on experience with Enterprise
 **frontend development** 
 with
 **React** 
 ,
 **JavaScript/TypeScript** 
 , or equivalent modern frontend technologies.
   

  

**A Bit About Your Background (You Also Have)**
 Bachelor’s Degree (or higher) in Computer Science or Software engineering or equivalent experience
   

  

 Excellent English language and communication skills (oral and written)
   

  

 Previous experience with application and software development.
   

  

**Additional facts and recruitment process:**
**Application deadline** 
 : June 24th 2025.
   

**To apply for the position** 
 : Please attach both CV and a personal letter.
   

**Work location** 
 : Bergshamra, Stockholm (Sweden) or Riga (Latvia)
   

**Travelling** 
 : Some travelling in the Nordics is required for this position
   

**Start** 
 : As soon as possible by agreement
   

**For more information** 
 : Contact Klas Sjögren, Nordic Head of CRM and Marketing Solutions, klas.sjogren@if.se
   

  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Software Engineer - Game Development
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Spectator Sports, and Entertainment Providers
description:
**Contribute to the technical backbone of immersive golf experiences, integrating game logic, player stats, and live tracking systems to deliver seamless and engaging gameplay** 




  





**WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE GOLF?** 




  





**Our mission** 
 is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our product brings people together and encourages them to get active which enables a healthier lifestyle. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people spend their quality time bonding and playing with their family and friends. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥
 



  





**At our new office** 
 , you can expect to meet humble, helpful and driven colleagues. You will join an organization where everyone has a voice and can make an impact. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to something meaningful as we undergo exciting changes and growth. We are committed to creating an environment where you can grow professionally and individually. As well as creating a social work environment by creating fun activities like morning fika, gym sessions, mob programming, after-work, table tennis, and golf simulator sessions to name a few! 🥳 🏓 ☕️
 



  





**We are proud** 
 to be on a journey where we're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our newly renovated R&D office in Stockholm, Sweden. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 We are looking for a passionate and skilled Software Developer with experience in C#, DevOps practices, and system integrations to help shape the future of golf gaming and simulation. You will work at the intersection of game mechanics, real-world ball tracking data, and system infrastructure, building scalable services and tools that bring the game of golf to life through technology.
 



 This is a unique opportunity to contribute to the technical backbone of immersive golf experiences, integrating game logic, player stats, and live tracking systems to deliver seamless and engaging gameplay.
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Develop backend services and game-related components using C# and .NET Core/.NET 6+.
* Integrate with software and hardware systems (e.g., ball tracking sensors, launch monitors) and real-time data feeds.
* Understanding REST APIs and knowledge of real-time services(Message broker systems, Rabbit MQ) to support gameplay, leaderboards, stats, and session management.
* Collaborate with gameplay engineers and UI/UX designers to support features like multiplayer, shot tracing, and in-game metrics.
* Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines for fast and stable deployment of game backend services and tooling.
* Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS) to support scalable and low-latency services.
* Monitor system performance and resolve production issues in live game environments.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of game system integration, reliability, and performance.


- 


**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* Strong experience in C# and .NET Core/.NET 6+.
* Experience with RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and real-time communication protocols.
* Familiarity with DevOps pipelines and deployment automation (e.g., GitLab).
* Worked with game engines like Unity (especially with C# scripting) is a big plus.
* Experience with cloud environments, Docker, and container orchestration (e.g., Kubernetes).
* Solid understanding of asynchronous programming, threading, and performance optimization.
* Ability to debug across systems and analyze logs in distributed environments.



  





**BONUS IF YOU HAVE** 



* Experience in sports tech, simulators, or tracking systems (golf, baseball, etc.).
* Understanding of golf, gameplay mechanics, and player expectations.
* Contributed to commercial projects with networked components.



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates who come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all the colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range near your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence.
 



  





**Activities** 



* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Stockholm. We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Mobile Software Developer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a Mobile Developer Consultant at Coody, you’ll dive into technically challenging and engaging assignments that help companies level up their teams and projects. You’ll be crafting high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code using native or hybrid platforms (such as Android, iOS, React Native, Kotlin Multiplatform or Flutter). You will collaborate close with other engineers, designers, product people and other teams to build mobile experiences for some of the most exciting brands within tech.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to hit the ground running in new environments. New challenges? Bring them on. We see them as opportunities for growth. Typically, you’ll take on 1-2 different assignments per year. Are you ready to make a difference?
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re looking for a Mobile Developer with
 **5+ years of experience** 
 and a doer’s mindset. Here’s what we’re after:
   

  

* Strong expertise in either Swift, Kotlin, Flutter or React Native
* Unit testing experience and a solid understanding of the release cycle, and CI/CD
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Mathematics (or similar)
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criteria? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

****What you’ll be doing****

* Prototyping, Testing & Debugging on real hardware, ensuring top-notch quality and reliability throughout development.
* Collaborating on product and service strategy, engineering best practices, and building strong team spirit with your client.


****Who you are****
 We’re after skilled problem-solvers who love to build, optimize, and innovate in the embedded and firmware space. You thrive in hands-on development and enjoy tackling complex technical challenges.
   

  

* At least 4-5 years of experience as an Embedded Software Engineer.
* Deep expertise in C, C++ or Embedded Python, plus experience with other embedded or firmware related areas.
